metadata.description: A sprawling, abandoned theme park on the outskirts of the city. Once a popular destination for families and thrill-seekers, it has since fallen into disrepair, its once-vibrant colors now faded and worn. The gardens are home to strange, glowing plants that seem to pulse with an otherworldly energy.
metadata.atmosphere: Eerie, haunting, with hints of a forgotten magic.
metadata.significance: A mysterious nexus point between worlds, where the boundaries between reality and fantasy blur.
